{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21764v1", "title": "On the quotient of a groupoid by an action of a 2-group", "summary": "If X is a groupoid equipped with an action of a 2-group G then one has a
2-groupoid X/G. We describe the fibers of the functor from X/G to the
1-groupoid $\pi_0(X)/\pi_0(G)$. We also give an explicit model for X/G in a
certain situation.", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT,math.AG,math.NT", "published": "2025-04-30T16:02:59Z"}
